Bases: object

A class to parse FAIR ontology sheets and create a corresponding RDFLib graph.

add_external_ontology_info()[source]

Adds external ontology information to all terms in the RDFLib graph that belonged to other ontologies in the FAIR sheets.

parse_data_properties()[source]

Parses data properties from a CSV file and updates the RDFLib and Graphviz graphs.

This method reads data properties from a specified CSV file and processes each row to generate URIs for data properties, create RDF triples, and update a Graphviz graph. The method handles different namespaces based on the ontology specified in the CSV rows.

Returns:

A dictionary containing processed data properties and their URIs.

Return type:

dict

Raises:

  • FileNotFoundError – If the data property CSV file cannot be found.

  • csv.Error – If there is an error reading the CSV file.

parse_entities()[source]

Parses the entity CSV file and updates the RDFLib and Graphviz graphs with the terms, definitions, and other information specified in the CSV file.

Returns:

A dictionary containing processed entities and their URIs.

Return type:

dict

parse_namespace()[source]

Parses the namespace CSV file and updates the RDFLib graph with namespace bindings.

Returns:

A tuple containing:

  • dict: A dictionary of namespace prefixes and their corresponding base URIs.

  • dict: A dictionary of the ontology OWL file URI and its corresponding base URI.

Return type:

tuple

parse_object_properties()[source]

Parses the relationship CSV file and updates the RDFLib and Graphviz graphs with the terms, definitions, and other information about relationships specified in the CSV file.

Returns:

A dictionary containing processed object properties and their corresponding URIs.

Return type:

dict

Bases: object

A class to save an input RDFLib graph under different formats and generate corresponding documentation for the ontology.

an RDFLib graph containing all information about the ontology.

an Graphviz graph containing all information about the ontology.

Type:

Type:

generate_pylode_html()[source]

Generates an HTML file using PyLODE for the RDFLib graph containing all information about the ontology.

Returns:

The file path of the generated HTML file.

Return type:

str

save_graphviz_graph()[source]

Saves the Graphviz graph to a PNG file.

Raises:

graphviz.exceptions.GraphvizError – If the graph is empty and cannot be printed.

save_rdflib_graph_jsonld()[source]

Saves the RDFLib graph to a JSON-LD file.

Returns:

The file path of the saved JSON-LD file.

Return type:

str

save_rdflib_graph_owl()[source]

Saves the RDFLib graph to an OWL file in TTL format.

Returns:

The file path of the saved OWL file.

Return type:

str
